content.title: Mapping the Data to Services
content.body:
• From the left pane select LastName {string}.
    From the right pane expand TextField- tbxLastName, and select text {string}.
  • From the left pane select NickName {string}.
    From the right pane expand TextField- tbxNickName, and select text {string}.
  • From the left pane select Phone{string}.
    From the right pane expand TextField- tbxPhone, and select text {string}.
  1. Click Save.
